short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chromium Extension that allows you to set a timer that counts down and then closes the tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to quickly set a countdown timer on a tab.  Once the timer expires, the tab closes.  Every tab can have a different timer.  Enter time by typing or by using a mousewheel.
---
Changes for v1.2.1
- Fixed "undefined" on first run issue.
- Improved styling.
- Time updates immediately upon opening popup.
- Added error handling
---
Changes for v1.1
- Add dark mode based on current system settings
- Save last alarm values as default for next time
- Update to chrome manifest v3
